titlestmt.titleproper: Register of the John Vaizey Papers, 1926-1985
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by D. Kincaid And Rebecca Mead; machine-readable finding aid created by Xiuzhi Zhou

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2016-10-24T11:58-0700

did.abstract: Writings, correspondence, appointment books, printed matter, phonotapes, and photographs, relating to education in Great Britain and elsewhere; calculation of economic aspects of education; economic conditions in Great Britain; economic theory, especially the natures of capitalism and socialism; public support of the arts; contemporary British culture; and British politics.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], John Vaizey Papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1986.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

chronitem.event: Author (with Patrick Lynch), Guinness's Brewery in the Irish Economy
Fellow and Tutor, Worcester College, Oxford

eventgrp.event: Editor, The Residual Factor and Economic Growth
Editor, (with E.A.G. Robinson), The Economics of Education
Author, Education in the Modern World
Author (with John Sheehan), Resources for Education

chronitem.event: Author (with colleagues), The Economics of Educational Costing
Author, The Political Economy of Education
Author (with Keith Norris), The Economics of Research and Technology

eventgrp.event: Editor, Economic Sovereignty and Regional Policy

chronitem.event: Author (with C.F.O. Clarke), Education: The State of the Debate
Life Peer, Lord John Ernest Vaizey, Baron of Greenwich
Author (with Keith Norris), Teach Yourself Economics

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Clippings, correspondence and miscellany relating to the life of John Ernest Vaizey, Baron of Greenwich, arranged alphabetically by form.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence of Lord and Lady Vaizey, arranged alphabetically by correspondent.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Drafts and printed copies of books, articles, clippings, correspondence, speeches, lectures, reports, radio broadcasts, drama, book reviews and background material. Arranged chronologically.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Clippings, correspondence, lists, press releases, reports, printed articles, transcripts and pamphlets relating to education, economics, British politics and government, Northern Ireland, UNESCO, and other subjects. Arranged alphabetically by subject.

did.unittitle: Correspondence, Letters to the Vaizey family upon Lord Vaizey's death

General. Includes correspondence neither to nor from Vaizey family, lists of correspondents, obituary, printed programs, and holograph drafts by John Vaizey of programs for his funeral and memorial service
Dreams, Some make reference to Dr. M. Coghlan
Includes correspondence with P. I. H. Taylor, astrologer, 1965-1969
General. Curricula vitae for Lord and Lady John Vaizey
General. Notes used in the drafting of "Autobiography"
"John Vaizey: Emergence of a British Economist," International Social Sciences Journal, Printed Copy
"What we Know about my Mother's Family," Annotated 1982. Typescript
"A History of My Own Life," Holograph
General. Correspondence neither to nor from John Vaizey,
American Enterprise Institute for Public Policy Research,
Annan, Lord Noel. Includes correspondence with others and writings by Annan
Barker, Anthony, Includes "Planning Inquiries: a role for Parliament," 1984
Bragg, S. L., Includes correspondence with A.J. Reynolds; House of Lords Official Report (Hansard), printed copy

British Council, Includes correspondence with Conor Cruise O'Brien, a British Council prospectus; curricula vitae and other materials relating to John Vaizey's application for the position of Director-General
Bull, George, 1984. Includes articles written by John Vaizey for Director
Centre for Policy Studies, Includes prospectus
Chalmers, Ray, Includes correspondence with others
Chief, Bureau of Criminal Identification and Investigation,

Congdon, Tim, Includes "The Analytical Foundations of the Medium-Term Financial Strategy," 1984.
Conservative and Unionist Central Office, Includes correspondence with Baroness Seear
Cowan, L. D., Includes correspondence with others
Department of Health and Social Security, Includes notes and other materials relating to John Vaizey's claim for sickness benefit

Donnelly, Desmond, 1963-1968. Includes D. Donnelly, "The British Economy," speech, House of Commons, August 2, 1965, printed copy; review (by Dean Acheson) of D. Donnelly, "Struggle for the World," typescript; A. S. Parkes, "Biological Aspects of the Population Explosion," Advancement of Science, printed copy; correspondence with Dean Acheson, 1965
Donnelly, Rosemary, Includes program for Desmond Donnelly's funeral
Ferguson, James L., Includes program for General Foods Corporation dinner
Franks, Lord Oliver and Lady Barbara,
Garrison, Arthur, Includes various articles by others
Gombos, Laszlo, 1983. Includes letter to the editor of The Times
Guildhall School of Music and Drama, Includes prospectus, clippings, notes, curriculum vitae and other materials relating to John Vaizey's application for the post of Principal
Gulbenkian Foundation, Includes memoranda and pamphlet relating to the Foundation and John Vaizey's tenure as Chairman
Hablan, Peter, 1977-1978. Includes an article by Teddy Kollek, "Jerusalem," Foreign Affairs, offprint
Harris of High Cross, Rt. Hon. Lord,
Heath, Rt. Hon. Edward, Includes John Vaizey, "Manpower Planning," manuscript and an untitled and undated speech by Edward Heath relating to education
Hibbert, Reginald, Includes newsletters from the Ditchley Foundation
Horlock, John, Includes Open University materials
Howe, Rt. Hon. Sir Geoffrey, Includes an untitled, undated lecture fragment by Sir Geoffrey Howe
James, Canon Eric, Includes correspondence with others; clippings; printed matter of a religious nature
Joseph, Rt. Hon. Sir Keith, Includes a printed copy of a lecture by Keith Joseph, "Monetarism is not Enough," lecture, 1976, printed copy
Lynch, Patrick, Includes clippings; correspondence from others
Ministerio de Educacion y Ciencia, Orden Civil de Alfonso X El Sabio,
Moyne, Lord B., Includes clippings and correspondence with others
National Health Service, Includes correspondence with various departments within the Health Service, as well as with Margaret Thatcher
O'Brien, George, Includes an obituary by John Vaizey, clipping, and a printed article by George O'Brien, "Het Droombeeld van de Overvloed," n.d.
Queen Elizabeth Military Hospital, Includes correspondence with others; materials relating to John Vaizey's hospitalization, 1981
Rittner, Luke, Includes Arts Council of Britain, "Arts: Facts and Figures," 1982

Rockefeller Foundation, Includes correspondence with Rt. Hon. Lord Annan, Alan Bullock, A. H. Halsey, T. B. Smith, Ben Whitaker; Quentin Anderson, "Practical and Visionary Americans," n.d., offprint; memoranda; prospectus and other materials relating to John Vaizey's residency at the Rockefeller Foundation's Bellagio Study and Conference Center, Italy
Royal Institute of International Affairs, Includes correspondence with Rt. Hon. Lord Boyle, notes and other materials relating to John Vaizey's application for the position of Director
St. John-Stevas, Norman, Includes program for conference on the arts
Smith, Nico J., Includes photocopy of open letter written by Smith, n.d.
Society of Remedial Gymnastics, Includes correspondence and notes relating to grant eligibility for Remedial Gymnastics and Recreational Course
Spens, Lord, Includes correspondence with Rt. Hon. Tom King
Stansky, Lyman and Ruth. Includes correspondence of Lady Vaizey, their daughter
General. Enclosures, primarily clippings pertaining to Lord and Lady Vaizey
Thorneycroft, Lord, Includes correspondence with Conservative and Unionist Central Office
Thynne, Michael, Includes correspondence with others, notes and other materials relating to review of Thynne's sentence for rape and buggery
University College, London, Includes notes and other materials relating to John Vaizey's application for the position of Provost
University of Oxford, Includes notes and other materials relating to John Vaizey's application for the position of Director of the Institute of Agricultural Economics
University of California, San Diego, Includes correspondence with U. S. Treasury Department, Internal Revenue Service
Watermen and Lightermen, The Company of, Includes materials relating to John Vaizey's membership
Weidenfeld, Sir George, Includes prospectus for Ben Gurion University of the Negev Foundation
Wilson, Rt. Hon. Sir Harold, Includes a speech by Sir Harold Wilson, 1971 Sept. 8, and materials relating to John Vaizey's elevation to the peerage by Wilson, 1976
Woodham-Smith, Cecil Blanche, Includes copy of address at Woodham-Smith's memorial service, April 29, 1977
Young, Baroness, Includes notes on a trip by John Vaizey to Cyprus

Academic Council for Peace and Freedom. Correspondence, lists, press releases and miscellany,
Advisory Commission on Professional Manpower. Lists and summary statement,

Cumberland Lodge. Correspondence, report, printed materials, and miscellany,

Dalton, Hugh. Letters, including correspondence and a register relating to papers of Lord Dalton deposited in The British Library of Political and Economic Science by John Vaizey; newspapers collected by Lady Dalton relating to a railroad strike, and a royal wedding,
Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development. Clipping and description,
Philippines. Letter from Imelda Marcos and miscellany relating to a trip (for a meeting?),
Town and country planning. Report, correspondence, printed material, legislation, House of Lords session transcripts, and miscellany,
UNESCO. Correspondence, report, printed material, and a pamphlet,
Two phonotape recordings of a BBC interview with Joan Robinson, conducted by John Vaizey,
30 prints of Hugh Dalton; 1 print of A. Guiness, circa 1882 (reproduction); 1 print of a painting of John Foster, Baron O'Neil, circa 18th century,

5 group photographs, including Hugh Dalton, Clement Attlee, Ernest Bevin, Winston Churchill, Jawaharlal Nehru, other Cabinet ministers (?), circa 1945-1947; 4 prints of Hugh Dalton and colleagues in ceremonial robes; 4 prints of Hugh Dalton at a political march in Durham, 1956; 2 prints of Hugh Dalton in a presentation ceremony, 1947
